title: Has anyone in here felt like packing a small backpack with clothes and just leave?
body:
With an empty wallet. Just my backpack and I. Trying to make 5$ just to eat something and keep moving forward. 
Just keep heading to another state. Then if I manage to somehow obtain 20$ just get on a train and step down of it only when it has reached its final destination.

Is it stupid of me for wanting to do this?
